languages.text: Атака силовой булавой, которая наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем целям в области и оглушает цели, получившие 6 или более урона.
languages.original_text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.

traits.locale_text: Attack with a power maul that damages everyone in a pattern and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.
Атака силовой булавой, которая наносит урон всем целям в области и оглушает цели, получившие 6 или более урона.
Атака силовой булавой, которая наносит урон всем целям в области и оглушает цели, получившие 6 или более урона.

languages.text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.
languages.original_text: Атака силовой булавой, которая наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем целям в области и оглушает цели, получившие 6 или более урона.

traits.locale_text: Attack with a power maul that damages everyone in a template and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.
Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.
Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.

languages.text: Greift mit einem Energiestreitkolben an, der allen Feinden in einem bestimmten Gebiet {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt und sie betäubt, wenn sie 6 oder mehr Schaden erleiden.
languages.original_text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.

traits.locale_text: Greife mit einem Energiestreitkolben an, der allen in einer Vorlage Schaden zufügt und sie betäubt, wenn sie 6 oder mehr Schaden nehmen.

languages.text: Attaque à l'aide d'une masse énergétique qui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à toutes les cibles d'une zone et leur inflige l'effet Étourdissement si elles subissent 6 points de dégâts ou plus.
languages.original_text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.

traits.locale_text: Attaque à l'aide d'une masse énergétique qui inflige des dégâts à tous ceux qui se trouvent dans un certain rayon. Leur inflige également l'effet Étourdissement s'ils subissent 6 points de dégâts ou plus.

languages.text: 使用能量锤猛击区域内的所有敌人，受到至少6点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人会被眩晕。
languages.original_text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.

traits.locale_text: 使用能量锤猛击区域内的所有敌人，受到至少6点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人会被眩晕。

languages.text: Ataca con una maza de energía para {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañar{/g} a todos los objetivos en un área y los aturde si reciben 6 o más de daño.
languages.original_text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.

traits.locale_text: Ataca con una maza de energía para dañar a todos los objetivos en su área y los aturde si reciben 6 o más de daño.

languages.text: パワーモールで攻撃し、エリア内の全員に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、6以上のダメージを受けた相手を気絶させる。
languages.original_text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.

traits.locale_text: パワーモールで攻撃し、テンプレート内の全員にダメージを与え、6以上のダメージを受けた相手を気絶させる。

languages.text: Güç tokmağıyla yapılan ve belirli bir alandaki herkese {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} vererek 6 veya daha fazla hasar almaları durumunda da onları sersemleten saldırı.
languages.original_text: Attack with power maul that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} everyone in an area and stuns them if they take 6 or more damage.
